column2: Mouse observed to have poor balance 12/3/18 w/no noticeable tumor
Mouse observed to have swelling (possible tumor) around base of skull 12/9/18
Sac'd due to weight loss and continued problems w/coordiation
Never put on drug -- sac'd the day it would have been enrolled
Mouse found to have primary tumor invading through left-side of skull
Tumor was resting adjacent to brain but did not appear to have grown into brain upon gross observation
